questions.text:
#### Q1. What is it called when a tag with a leader has a drag control where the leader touches the element?

- %OPTION% Attached End
- %OPTION% Preferences > Reviewing
- %OPTION% Preferences > Reading
- %OPTION% Preferences > Commenting

#### Q2. A designer would like to create a new parameter in a schedule that contains a mathematical expression combining two existing fields. What is the process?

- %OPTION% `Edit Fields > Combined Parameter`
- %OPTION% `Sorting/Grouping > Grand Totals`
- %OPTION% `Formatting > Field Formatting > Calculate Totals`
- %OPTION% `Edit Fields > Calculated Parameter`

#### Q3. Where can you find a drop-down list of available named reference planes?

- %OPTION% in the **Properties** palette
- %OPTION% in the Project Browser
- %OPTION% on the Options Bar
- %OPTION% in the **Set Work Plane** dialog box

#### Q4. Some Revit families require a host element to be placed. Which choice is a hosted element?

- %OPTION% door
- %OPTION% floor
- %OPTION% furniture
- %OPTION% wall

#### Q5. In what type of view are you _unable_ to create a new level?

- %OPTION% section view
- %OPTION% elevation view
- %OPTION% 3D view
- %OPTION% plan view

#### Q6. In a model whose units are configured in feet, what would you type to get a liner object to be 100 millimeters long?

- %OPTION% 100'
- %OPTION% 100/25.4
- %OPTION% 100mm
- %OPTION% 100m

#### Q7. A colleague shared an Excel file with you, and you want to display a worksheet that is hidden in it. How can you do that?

- %OPTION% On the **View** tab, click **New Window**.
- %OPTION% On the **Review** tab, click **Unhide Sheet**.
- %OPTION% On the **Home** tab, click **Unhide**.
- %OPTION% Right-click any worksheet tab and select **Unhide**.

#### Q8. When sketching a roof by footprint, which option allows an edge of the sketch to be sloped in the final roof?

- %OPTION% Slope arrow
- %OPTION% Extend to wall core
- %OPTION% Defines slope
- %OPTION% Overhang

#### Q9. When importing a CAD drawing into a drafting view, how do you remove layers that you do not need?

- %OPTION% Select the imported CAD drawing, click the Query tool, and then in the dialog that appears, click **Delete**.
- %OPTION% Select the imported CAD drawing and, on the **Properties** palette, click **Edit Type** > **Delete Layers**.
- %OPTION% Select the improted CAD drawing, tab to select elements you don't want, and then press Delete.
- %OPTION% Select the imported CAD drawing, right-click, and select **Delete Layers**.

#### Q10. When working with design option, what _cannot_ be placed in the option sets?

- %OPTION% hosted components
- %OPTION% in-place models
- %OPTION% detail items
- %OPTION% system families

#### Q11. In a legend view, where would you find the drop-down list of the families - such as doors, windows, and other components - you want to use as legend components?

- %OPTION% contextual **Modify** tab on the ribbon
- %OPTION% Options Bar
- %OPTION% right-click menu
- %OPTION% Type Selector

#### Q12. While working in Revit, you often need additional lines to help define locations for elements in a mode. You can hide these lines in the appropriate views later, when necessary. What are these extra lines called?

- %OPTION% detail lines
- %OPTION% construction lines
- %OPTION% reference planes
- %OPTION% reference lines

#### Q13. What items stay the same size no matter the scale of the view?

- %OPTION% line weights
- %OPTION% annotative components with text
- %OPTION% model surface patterns
- %OPTION% hosted components

#### Q14. When hard-copy printing, what **Print** dialog option allows you to specify that you want sheet 100 of 100 sheets to be at the bottom of the pile, so that sheet 1 of 100 is on the top of the pile?

- %OPTION% Sort Sheets Descending Order
- %OPTION% Reverse Print Order
- %OPTION% Last Sheet to Bottom
- %OPTION% Set Sheets to Plot in Reverse

en.TITLE: Skill Assessments Quizzes
en.DESC:
Collection of questions and answers on different subjects aimed to help
you test your knowledge before an important job interview!

Data from __data__. UI by __bandinopla__

es.TITLE: Questionarios de evaluación de habilidades
es.DESC:
Colección de preguntas y respuestas sobre diferentes temas orientadas a
ayudarte a testear tu conocimiento antes de una importante entrevista de trabajo! 

Datos de __data__. UI por __bandinopla__
